name: FCheckBoxStyle
doc: Represents the appearance of an SCheckBox

CheckBoxType: The visual type of the checkbox
UncheckedImage: CheckBox appearance when the CheckBox is unchecked (normal)
UncheckedHoveredImage: CheckBox appearance when the CheckBox is unchecked and hovered
UncheckedPressedImage: CheckBox appearance when the CheckBox is unchecked and hovered
CheckedImage: CheckBox appearance when the CheckBox is checked
CheckedHoveredImage: CheckBox appearance when checked and hovered
CheckedPressedImage: CheckBox appearance when checked and pressed
UndeterminedImage: CheckBox appearance when the CheckBox is undetermined
UndeterminedHoveredImage: CheckBox appearance when CheckBox is undetermined and hovered
UndeterminedPressedImage: CheckBox appearance when CheckBox is undetermined and pressed
CheckedHoveredForeground: Foreground Color when checked and pressed
CheckedPressedForeground: Foreground Color when checked and pressed
UndeterminedForeground: Foreground Color when the check state is indeterminate
BorderBackgroundColor: BorderBackgroundColor refers to the actual color and opacity of the supplied border image on toggle buttons
CheckedSlateSound: The sound the check box should play when checked
UncheckedSlateSound: The sound the check box should play when unchecked
HoveredSlateSound: The sound the check box should play when initially hovered over
